familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received Over $5,000,000 in Capital Gains income from THRIVE PARTNERS III GP, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received Over $5,000,000 in Capital Gains income from THRIVE PARTNERS III GP, LLC (interest in venture capital fund; New York, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser.
